name: Bobby Yeung
title: Software Developer
summary: Building scalable cloud solutions and intuitive web applications. Specialized in modern frontend architectures and serverless backend systems. A highly motivated developer with a strong foundation in algorithmic problem solving and a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions. Dedicated to writing clean, maintainable code and staying up-to-date with emerging technologies.

education.institution: Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education
